pages.name: index
pages.title: Best Institute for Programming Courses in Delhi | Coding Blocks

metas.name: description
metas.content: India's best programming and software training institute offers courses in Java, C++, Android, NodeJS and more. Registration open for coding classes in Delhi.

slides.heading: CAST for AUGUST BATCHES!
slides.content: Coders' Admission & Scholarship Test (CAST) is back for foundation courses across all centres. Register now to stand a chance to avail a scholarship of up to 75% off the course fees.

slides.imgAlt: coders admission open c++, java, android, web development
slides.heading: Come, fall in LOVE with CODING this August!
Interview Preparation Bootcamp
slides.subHeading: Crack the Recruitment Procedures of top Tech Companies
slides.content: Learn from the masters, and realize your dream!

slides.heading: 50% Discount on Advanced Online Course!
slides.content: Advanced Module of India's best live Online Course on Data Structures & Algorithms starting July 5

staff.name: Manmohan Gupta
staff.bio: Manmohan Gupta (Munna Bhaiya), an IIT-Delhi graduate, is an ace programmer, technocrat, an entrepreneurial doyen and a mathematician. He has co-founded Software giant, Nagarro and Vidyamandir Classes(VMC). Having seen both the industries from up close, he could identify a key gap between college education and industry needs and has now set out to carve the path that will turn even ordinary students into industry-ready coders.

staff.name: Brij Mohan
staff.bio:
Brij Mohan or Bade bhaiya, as everyone calls him, is always full of energy and keeps everyone on feet with his motivation. He has vast experience of teaching and is the founder of Vidyamandir Classes.
Bade Bhaiya, through his personal and professional growth helps in motivating and mentoring students at Coding Blocks. He is an IIT Delhi alumnus.

staff.name: Anushray Gupta
staff.bio:
A code lover, with an undying passion for teaching, Anushray has done his Bachelor’s in CSE from IIIT Hyderabad. He has worked with major tech companies like Facebook and Directi and played major role in many successful start-ups.
He is one of the Co-Founders of Coding Blocks. He has received amazing feedbacks for his teaching and is now serving as Programme Designer at Coding Blocks.

staff.name: Priyanshu Agrawal
staff.bio: Priyanshu did his bachelors in Computer Science and is a MBA graduate from MDI, Gurgaon. He has experience of working in Management & Consulting domain with Boston Analytics & Novozymes. He has also worked for Vidyamandir Classes and Nagarro in the past.

staff.name: Arnav Gupta
staff.bio: Arnav Gupta, also popular as @ChampionSwimmer, is an acclaimed Android developer and two timer GSoC-er. He has presented at large conferences like JSFOO, DroidCon, FOSSASIA and OSDConf. He has also worked with Sony, Micromax, Cyanogen and the likes.Arnav has also active contributed int the development of Android OS, Linux Kernel and will also be mentoring students in GSoC’17.

staff.name: Prateek Narang
staff.bio: Passionate about teaching, Prateek is a CS graduate from DTU. He has previously worked with SanDisk, HackerEarth. He has also won various hackathons including Google’s Code For India, Smart City Hackathon, qualified ACM-ICPC regionals and published papers in International Journals. His interactive CV (www.prateeknarang.com) is also popular in 120+ countries.

staff.name: Sumeet Malik
staff.bio: Sumeet a CS graduade from PEC, has more than 7 years of industry experience at software giants like Nagarro in various technologies like Enterprise Java, JavaScript, Angular & React. He left the IT industry from the senior position of a Technical Lead, to pursue his passion to teach at Coding Blocks. He has received great feedback and praise for his teaching while serving as corporate trainer and mentor for 2 years at Nagarro.

staff.name: Rajesh Sachdev
staff.bio: Rajesh has 20+ years of experience in IT/Corporate sector. He has previously worked with corporates like Nagarro, Cadence, American Express. He left IT industry in 2013 and moved to education with a passion to help students accomplishing their career goals. He did MS from BITS Pilani.

staff.name: Ankit Malik
staff.bio: IIT Delhi graduate passionate about web application design and web programming. Has worked with companies like Facebook, Barclays and WorldQuant. Co-founder of a technology consultancy firm with 3+ years experience of building data-intensive web solutions for US based pharma cos.

staff.name: Varun Kohli
staff.bio: Has been associated with the IT industry for almost 10 years & has served various roles in multiple domains. He has exhaustive experience in Software products, Business intelligence & business development.

staff.name: Harpreet Singh
staff.bio: Harpreet has worked on several Enterprise level applications  and has successfully piloted several Startups. He did his B. Tech in Computers from UIET, Kurukshetra in 2013. He now dedicates his energy and experience to students to make them superb programmers.

staff.name: Nipun Jain
staff.bio: Nipun is an ace Android programmer and has several highly trending Apps to his credit. Nipun has around 6+ years of Industry experience in Software giants, beyond which he opted for teaching to pursue his passion

metas.name: description
metas.content: India's best programming and software training institute offers courses in Java, C++, Android, NodeJS and more. Know more about Coding Blocks.

metas.name: description
metas.content: Biggest strength of Coding Blocks is its world-class team. To learn programming from the leaders, visit Coding Blocks Delhi, Noida, Amritsar or Jalandhar centre.

staff.name: Shubham Dokania
staff.bio: A Mathematics and Computing Engineer from DTU, Shubham is an avid Machine learning researcher, data scientist and web developer. He has presented a paper at IEEE CISS 2017 at the John Hopkins University, and aims to push forward the boundaries of what machines can achieve.

staff.name: Harpreet Singh
staff.bio: Harpreet has worked on several Enterprise level applications  and has successfully piloted several Startups. He did his B. Tech in Computers from UIET, Kurukshetra in 2013. He now dedicates his energy and experience to students to make them superb programmers.

staff.name: Nipun Jain
staff.bio: Nipun is an ace Android programmer and has several highly trending Apps to his credit. Nipun has around 6+ years of Industry experience in Software giants, beyond which he opted for teaching to pursue his passion

staff.name: Garima Chhikara
staff.bio: Garima pursued her masters from IIIT-Delhi and joined us to pursue her passion for teaching. She has worked with DRDO and has interest and experience in technologies like Virtual Reality, Internet of Things, Software Defined Networking, Cloud Services, Information Retrieval and Data Mining.

staff.name: Rishab Kapoor
staff.bio: A graduate from Guru Nanak Dev University, Rishab has worked with Harman Connected Services as a software engineer. He is proficient with web development related technologies like HTML, CSS, Javascript along with Internet of Things development, OSGi framework, Spring and Hibernate.

staff.name: Aayush Arora
staff.bio: Always ready for a Chess match and a cup of coffee, Aayush is a team member and an active contributor in Open Source organizations like CloudCV, FOSSASIA and Open Design. He is an avid web developer and will also be mentoring students in Google Summer of Code 2017.

staff.name: Harshit Dwivedi
staff.bio: Renowned for his “awesome” puns and stash of shwags, Harshit is a Google Certified Android Developer. He has been a GSoC participant with FOSSASIA and will also be mentoring students under GSoC 2017. He is an open source enthusiast and is also passionate about Data Science.

staff.name: Deepak Aggarwal
staff.bio: Popular for his creative thinking style, Deepak tries to offer creative solutions to problems. He is a succesful competitive programmer, having qualified for ACM-ICPC Regionals won the International Problem Solving Competition by Dyalog APL. He likes to spend his free time reading.

staff.name: Anuj Garg
staff.bio: Anuj is an open-source enthusiast and a GSoCer under the RedHat Foundation. He has worked in the core teams of various products by RedHat and is an expert in Enterprise Java and web services. He is also a mentor in GSoC '17 under the umbrella of JBoss for Servers and IoT monitoring.

staff.name: Varun Kohli
staff.bio: Has been associated with the IT industry for almost 10 years & has served various roles in multiple domains. He has exhaustive experience in Software products, Business intelligence & business development.

staff.name: Mohd Fahad
staff.bio: Fahad is a DTU graduate and is passionate about quizzing, public speaking and food. An engineer by qualification but not by interest, he chose a career in marketing and business development. He tries to be the Blocks in Coding Blocks by contributing towards every non-Coding aspect.

staff.name: Prajjwal Singh
staff.bio: Prajjwal is guilty of programming and other cybershenanigans. Experienced with Ruby / Rails / Sinatra, as well as JavaScript / Node / Express. Other than that, he is into UNIX, Number Theory, Machine Learning, Declarative Programming, and trolling Emacs users on IRC.

staff.name: Mohammad Umair
staff.bio: Umair is a full-stack developer with extensive Android and Web projects under his hat. He’s passionate about building scalable products from scratch. In his free time, he likes to contribute to open source.

metas.name: description
metas.content: India's best programming and software training institute offers courses in Java, C++, Android, NodeJS and more. Why to choose Coding Blocks.
